Class ReinforcementController

        public int calculateOwnedCountryReward​(Player player)
        calculates the reinforcement reward armies for total owned country

        Returns:

      • calculateContinentReward

        public int calculateContinentReward​(Player player,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continents> continents,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countries,
                                    java.lang.String countryName)
        calculates the reinforcement armies reward continent reward
        Parameters:
        player - player object containing all player information
        continents - hashmap containing continent objects
        countries - hashmap containing countries objects
        countryName - the country for which we need the continents and country object information
        cardReward - the reward army obtained after card exchange
        Returns:
        returns reward armies for continent obtained as integer

      • exchangeCard

        public int exchangeCard​(int num1,
                        int num2,
                        int num3,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> currentCardList,
                        Player player)
        This method will calculate rewarded armies to be obtained after exchanging cards
        Parameters:
        num1 - 1st number selected from card exchange view
        num2 - 2nd number selected from card exchange view
        num3 - 3rd number selected from card exchange view
        currentCardList - is the list of cards in players possession
        player - player object containing all player information
        Returns:
        the method will return number of reward army the player will get after exchanging the cards

      • calculateReinforceArmy

        public int calculateReinforceArmy​(int countryReward,
                                  int continentReward,
                                  int cardReward)
        Returns:
        returns the total reinforce army for country reward, continent reward and card reward

      • placeReinforceArmy

        public java.lang.String placeReinforceArmy​(java.lang.String countryName,
                                           int numOfArmiesToPlace,
                                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countries,
                                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Player> playerMap,
                                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continents> continents,
                                           Player mp)
        this method will be called when the place reinforcement army command will be given
        Parameters:
        countryName - where the army will be placed
        numOfArmiesToPlace - the armies to be placed will be mentioned in command line
        countries - countries hashmap containing countries objects
        playerMap - player hashmap containing all the player data
        continents - continents hashmap containing continent objects
        mp - is the player object model for the turn
        Returns:
        success or failure messages for each situation
